summary: Full fur skins for CBBE v3 and Dimonized UNP.  Many options available. Make the Khajiits of your world look exactly how you want them.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of the Khajiit female originally made specifically for CBBE. I loved Thepal\'s skin for the Khajiit and sadly could not find a skin that was just as beautiful for CBBE (and I don\'t want a half-skin/half-fur hybrid) so I decided to adapt the skin myself. I hope that others enjoy this skin as much as I do!

Version 2: This skin is now CBBE version 3 compatible! NOT ONLY THAT BUT THIS IS NOW COMPATIBLE WITH dimon99\'s UNP BODY! The 8 nipple, smooth and barbie variants have been updated and added.

Version 1.31: Fixed a weird artifact that was causing a large discoloration of the right breast.

Version 1.3: It seams everyone hated the little patch of darker pubic fur, so here at last are alternate versions of the skin! I included both 2 and 8 nipple versions of the skins and a barbie version for those who want as much fur as possible. These skins are provided in every possible combination including new \"Smooth\" versions. The Smooth skins have the belly button covered with fur (but there\'s still some shading to keep the shape of the stomach intact). I included this because honestly who has seen a belly button on any sort of furred creature? Men with any sort of of chest/stomach hair could tell you how easy it is for your bellybutton to disappear.

Version 1.2: Not sure if it\'s possible to fix the hip seams as the problem appears to lie with the CBBE model and the way it stretches the textures. My focus has shifted to reducing the seam\'s visibility. This version is the first step towards that goal. As it currently stands, the seams are not noticeable unless zoomed in completely and looking for them. I will continue to work on this issue as I address my other goals for this mod.

Patch Notes v2
~ Compatible with CBBE v3
~ Compatible with dimon99\'s UNP
~ Updated and re-added optional skins

Patch Notes v1.31
~ No more horrible bright slash on the right breast

Patch Notes v1.3
~ Added 8 nipple versions
~ Added versions without pubic hair
~ Added Smooth belly buttonless versions
~ Added full fur barbie versions

Patch Notes: v1.2
~ Darkened fur slightly to reduce odd glare
~ Reduced the visibility of the hip seams
~ Removed unnecessary files
~ Now works with both CBBE and CBBE slim editions

Patch Notes: v1.1
~ Adjusted belly button position
~ Tried to fix horrid hip seams (still not fixed T_T)

To Do List:
~ Clean hand seams (in progress)
~ Add tiger skin
~ Convince everyone I\'m not a furry

Credits:
Based on Thepal\'s Nude Females: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70
For use with Caliente\'s CBBE: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
For use with dimon99\'s UNP: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
author: KisaFayd
